summary: This document is an email chain from September 2019 among law enforcement personnel discussing a New York Post article about an anonymous 'John Doe' who petitioned a judge to remain unnamed in a case related to Jeffrey Epstein's 'gal pal'. The correspondents are trying to identify this individual.

events.title: Publication of John Doe article
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article titled 'John Doe begs judge not to name names in Epstein gal pal case'.

keyFacts: An anonymous 'John Doe' filed a petition with a judge to avoid being named in a case involving Jeffrey Epstein's associate (referred to as 'gal pal').
Law enforcement personnel, including the FBI New York field office, were actively trying to identify this John Doe in September 2019.
The correspondence shows internal law enforcement communication and monitoring of media related to the Epstein case.
